summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North 83rd street, from Woodland Park Avenue to a point approximately 200 feet west of Aurora Avenue; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92722 to of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
